pkgmetadata.longdescription: Programmatically generate interfaces to C routines and data structures that are accessed dynamically via Rffi // This package allows us to programmatically read C code to get descriptions of routines and data types and then generate R code and class definitions that allow us to invoke those routines and access the contents of the native data structures all using R code and Rffi. So there is no need to explicitly compile C code for each routine or data structure.
